settings.disclaimer_bar_text: It is a made to order outfit. Thus, COD is not applicable on it.
settings.promo_bar_text: Due to overwhelming query volume, it's taking us time to connect to our customers. Please be patient as we deliver your orders, on promised time, with love and care.

settings.title: About LAAM
settings.text: LAAM is changing the way people find clothes by combining technology with the personal touch of experienced style experts and fashion consultants.
Sign up for our newsletter and be the first to know about coupons and special promotions.

settings.title: Shiza Hassan
settings.text: Shiza Hassan trumps in the design aesthetics, craftsmanship and beauty of an ensemble and this is what that makes each piece unique. There is extensive usage of traditional crafts worked into contemporary fashion forms with the usage of zardozi, kamdani, Gresham and 3D embellishments like crystals, chains, uncut stones, metallic and pearl pieces etc.

settings.title: Tena Durrani
settings.text: Tena Durrani has successfully proven itself as a topmost designer house and fabricated the label which has renowned for exquisite Resham embroidery. She took it upon herself to bring traditions to the millennial generation and deliver it in modern style.

settings.title: Zainab Salman
settings.text: Zainab Salman produces Pret-a-porter, Luxury Pret, Haute Couture & Bridals line. It's known for its traditional and au courantmotifs, baroque hand embriodry and embaliishments. The brand is essential for those who will settle for nothing less than quality and stitching details in their Eastern wear.

settings.title: Karma
settings.text: Karma is one of the pioneer fashion brand of Pakistan that provides its clients classic elegance, star power glamour, fabulous clothes and the complete retail experience. Karma is a name that resonates with bridal wear in Pakistan. Every Pakistani bride wants to dress up in Karma on her big day. Karma consists of three brands, Karma Pink, Karma Couture and Karma Wedding.
